description: Kira finds herself locked into a neck trap in a large dark room. From the shadows creeps her captor who is moving in to torment her. She is helpless, although the only thing restrained is her neck, and can't stop the pain and suffering that is coming. She is suspended by leather and chains and then fucked in her slutty ass. She is only a piece of meat to him and he will have his way with her. The floating spread eagle has her as helpless as possible and her nipples and feet fall under extreme torment.
title: From the Shadows
